info.name: TubeBirds - Revenue Pricing Update
info.description: Collection for updating Revenue Plan prices via API

request.description:
Updates all Revenue plan prices with new pricing structure:

- Revenue Starter: ₹1,600 (was ₹2,500)
- Revenue Booster: ₹3,200 (was ₹5,000)
- Revenue Pro: ₹6,400 (was ₹9,000)
- Revenue Elite: ₹12,000 (was ₹16,000)
- Revenue Master: ₹23,000 (was ₹30,000)

All with 0% discount (was 50% discount)
